verses.name: Matthew 27:19
verses.text: When he was set down on the judgment seat, his wife sent unto him, saying, Have thou nothing to do with that just man: for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him.

verses.name: Matthew 27:20
verses.text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas, and destroy Jesus.

verses.name: Matthew 27:21
verses.text: The governor answered and said unto them, Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you? They said, Barabbas.

verses.name: Matthew 27:22
verses.text: Pilate saith unto them, What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ? They all say unto him, Let him be crucified.
